messages.title: DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION!
messages.content: The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our climate is breaking down. This is an unprecedented global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions
Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A GREEN VOTE SENDS A MESSAGE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The other parties think that rhetoric and eye-catching targets are enough to get the green vote. They need to see that people demand action

mentions.candidate: I need your help to deliver our message of more jobs in a just, green economy, our determination for a society where everyone can live in dignity, and our belief that Scotland’s future is in Europe.

issues.economy: Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions.
issues.environment: Our climate is breaking down. This is an unprecedented global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions. The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12.
issues.labourEmployment: Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries. I need your help to deliver our message of more jobs in a just, green economy.

examples: We have just a decade left to radically cut emissions.
This is an unprecedented global emergency.
The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12.
This is an unprecedented global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions.
The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12.
Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions.
I need your help to deliver our message of more jobs in a just, green economy, our determination for a society where everyone can live in dignity, and our belief that Scotland’s future is in Europe.
The other parties think that rhetoric and eye-catching targets are enough to get the green vote. They need to see that people demand action.
